sentences.en: A generalized model for cluster formation of arsenic atoms has been derived.
sentences.cn: 砷原子生成聚集群团的一般模型已经导出.

sentences.en: Conditions are then suitable for the formation of heavier elements.
sentences.cn: 这样的情况适于形成较重的元素.

sentences.en: DMS triggers the formation of unusually small water droplets.
sentences.cn: DMS气体促使异常微细的水滴形成.

sentences.en: During pollen formation a compound is produced naturally in the anther.
sentences.cn: 在花粉形成过程中,花药内天然产生一种化合物.

sentences.en: He was flying in formation with seven other jets.
sentences.cn: 他和其他7架喷气机一起列队飞行。

sentences.en: Kinetin was later shown to be inhibitory for embryoid formation.
sentences.cn: 激动素原来被表明抑制胚状体的形成.

sentences.en: My profession had an important influence in the formation of my character and temperament.
sentences.cn: 我的职业对我性格和脾气的形成有重要的影响。

sentences.en: Of special interest is the photographic determination of altitudes of lunar formation.
sentences.cn: 最有趣的是用照相来测定月面结构物的高度.

sentences.en: Shangzhou was an important period for the formation and development of theocracy.
sentences.cn: 商周时期是神权政治形成与发展的重要阶段。

sentences.en: The aircraft are flying in formation.
the formation of a new government
The heats of formation of various ionic compounds show tremendous variations.
sentences.cn: 各种离子化合物的生成热显示出有很大的差异.

sentences.en: The main thrust of the research will be the study of the early Universe and galaxy formation.
sentences.cn: 此项研究的核心是早期宇宙和银河系的形成。

sentences.en: The tuffaceous formation , isolated remnants, are about 200 - 250 ft thick.
sentences.cn: 凝灰岩构造的局部残存段的厚度约为 200-250 ?铡?

sentences.en: They saw a squadron of fifteen motorcycle policemen driving in V-formation.
sentences.cn: 他们看见15名警察骑着摩托车排成V字形前行。

sentences.en: Uranium minerals also occur in the basal beds of the kombolgie formation.
sentences.cn: 铀矿物也见于科姆波尔吉建造的基底层位中.

sentences.en: We now know a lot more about the early stages of planetary formation.
sentences.cn: 我们现在对行星形成过程的早期阶段有了更多的了解。

phrases.tran_cn: 地层损害，油层损害；生产层损坏
图形生成；图样形成；模式形成
n. 构词，构词法；词性转换

trans.tran_cn: 形成，构成，结构，形成物，编队，队形，奇峰，怪石，某种形状的云
trans.tran_en: the process of starting a new organization or group
